alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Marathon; Oneida; Portage; Vilas; Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 12:44PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...LOW HUMIDITY, GUSTY WINDS AND POSSIBLE DRY LIGHTNING WILL RESULT IN NEAR CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS THIS AFTERNOON... Very low relative humidity, winds gusting to 20 to 25 mph, warm temperatures and dry fuels will result in near-critical fire weather conditions across north central and central this afternoon. In addition, there is potential for dry thunderstorms after 4 pm, which could result in a few lightning-caused fires. Residents are urged to be careful with any activities that could potentially lead to a wildland fire. Campfires, outdoor grills, smoking materials, chain saws, and all-terrain vehicles all have the potential to throw a spark and ignite a dangerous and destructive fire. Debris burning should not be attempted. Burning restrictions are in place, and residents should check the Wisconsin Department of Natural Resources website for additional information.
